title: Ownership of the space/land, where substation is proposed shall vest with concerned owner/society/association or the person deriving the title, and easement rights will vest with concerned Electric Authority till CSS/DSS remain inexistence and functional
clause_text: Ownership of the space/land, where substation is proposed shall vest with concerned owner/society/association or the person deriving the title, and easement rights will vest with concerned Electric Authority till CSS/DSS remain inexistence and functional.
